metadata.title: Algarvianroots - Ecotourism in the Algarve
metadata.description: Algarvianroots is a company that offers ecotourism experiences in the Algarve. Discover the natural and cultural heritage of the Algarve with us.

mainpage.title: Algarvianroots
mainpage.subtitle: Ecotourism in the Algarve
mainpage.description: Este é um dicionário de exemplo.

about-us.title: About us
about-us.description:
Enter in this adventure and find what the natural and cultural heritage have to offer you. 
Authentic, different and diverse itineraries. 
Guided hikes, gastronomy tasting, workshops, birdwatching in the Algarve 
Ecotourism is a sustainable activity in natural areas, conserves the environment, keep the local people well-being and involves interpretation and education.

about-us.title: About us
about-us.description:
AlgarvianRoots is a tourism entertainment company focused on Ecotourism. We work in partnership with local agents to promote diverse experiences and boost the local economy, valuing the region's endogenous resources.
Our guides have academic studies in various fields, providing an in-depth interpretation of the experiences we offer, particularly regarding natural and cultural heritage.
The artisans, artists, and local producers we collaborate with have dedicated much of their lives to their crafts and take great pleasure in sharing their knowledge and skills.
The originality and diversity of the experiences we offer enable an authentic connection with the region

members.name: Francisco Simões
members.description: Francisco is a biologist with a passion for the Algarve's natural heritage. He has been working in ecotourism for over 10 years and is committed to promoting sustainable tourism in the region.

members.name: Rafael Lima
members.description: Rafael is a local historian who specializes in the region's cultural heritage. He offers guided tours of the Algarve's historic sites and traditional villages.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Contact us for more information about our activities and experiences. We are happy to help you plan your visit to the Algarve.
